rules: Let's begin the puzzle hunt! Here are some rules

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 1/3]
Now let's go through some ground rules before we hand you over to Void Deck Cat. Take your time to read them carefully, as your game timer has not started yet.

🐾 Your game is a trail of Stages with scheduled break(s) in between. All team members will receive the Stages from me at the same time, but only 1 team member is required to send a response at any given time to proceed. Please make sure only one person from the team sends me a message at any one time, or you will confuse the Cat and she may penalise you for it! Please be patient with the Cat as she ponders your answers.

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 2/3]
Your game will be timed. Each incorrect answer adds a penalty of 5min to your final timing, so answer carefully! Need help solving a Stage? Hints are available, but at a cost. Please refer to the image below for details.

The timer will be paused during breaks, so you can properly relax 😉

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 3/3] Finally, stay in public spaces, blend into your environment, and be discreet in your discussions - you never know if another team is listening in! In case of emergencies, tell me 'sos' and one of the Hidden Singapore humans will get in touch. You do not need to enter any fenced premises or private property unless specifically asked to. Feel free to also send in your selfies and photos through the race and have a chance to win our Selfie of the Month contest. Ready for your first Stage? Team captain, tell me 'UNDERSTOOD' and I will hand you over to Void Deck Cat. Good luck.

text:
Stage 1:
Look at the image carefully, it will lead you to the location. When facing the shrine hall, which side can you find the 👶🏻🦁?

仔细看图片，它会引导您到达位置。面对大殿时，您能在哪一边找到👶🏻🦁？ [请用英文来回答]
info: Stone Lions are symbols of protection (yin metal).the male lion represents power (yang metal) over the world in imperial china, while the female lion represents care (yang metal) for the souls in the building.
s1.hint: Look at the feet of the stone lions

text: Stage 2: You head towards LEFT side of the Monastery and find a Buddha Statue with a BELL 🔔. Look carefully, how many yellow chinese knots are there? [Spell out the number]
info: Did you know Ksitigarhba made a vow to take the responsibility to guide all living beings in the six realms and only achieve Buddhahood and get out of the cycle of birth and rebirth until all hell beings are out of hell (yin earth)
s2.hint: Circumambulate around Kshitigarbha and you will find your answer

text:
Stage 3:
Making your way towards the side gate, something sparkles at the corner of your eyes✨, lots of GEMS 💎💎💎 and GOLD 💰💵. There is a small hidden creature spewing GOLD 💰💰💰, what creature is that?
info: Did you know that the Yellow Dzambhala was assigned to help all beings overcome poverty and grant wealth to them.
s3.hint: Look for the label inside of the Yellow Dzambhala Statue

text:
Stage 4:
Let's RAMP UP the difficulty, look for a TIME CAPSULE. Make your way through the maze below from start to end. In the maze, you can only go through things found in the time capsule. Tell me what word you will form on your way out?
Time for a break. Head up to Level 2's Kitchen and enjoy the snacks!

Stage 5:
You exit the kitchen and walk towards the Buddha Statue at the end of the corridor. It is Thousand-armed and Thousand-eyed Avalokiteshvara. The multitude of hands and eyes is mesmerizing. 
Eh, something is missing from my photo. Can you tell me what is it?
